author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Inno Instrument to issue 3rd series convertible bonds worth 30 bln won
text:
April 11 (Reuters) - Inno Instrument Inc :
* Says it will issue 3rd series unregistered and unsecured private convertible bonds, to raise 30 billion won in proceeds for facilities and operations
* Maturity date is April 13, 2023, coupon rate is 0 percent and yield to maturity is 0 percent for the bonds
* Conversion price is 2,040 won/share and conversion ratio is 100 percent
Source text in Korean: goo.gl/dNeaQs
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
